plugins.name: Buycraft
plugins.desc:
Set up automatic stores for your server.
&cMake sure to follow the Minecraft EULA!
&cYou can view it here:
&chttps://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula

plugins.name: Enjin
plugins.desc:
Connect an Enjin site and Donationcraft store to your server.
&cMake sure to follow the Minecraft EULA!
&cYou can view it here:
&chttps://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula

plugins.name: Essentials
plugins.desc:
Essential commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Spawn
plugins.desc:
Setup a server spawn point.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Chat
plugins.desc:
Format the chat to make it look nicer.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Kit Adder
plugins.desc:
Add kits with commands
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Essentials Group Manager
plugins.desc:
Create permission systems.
&aAll Essentials plugins count as 1 plugin.

plugins.name: Permissions Ex
plugins.desc: Create permission systems.

plugins.name: AquaticPerms
plugins.desc: A super simple per-user permissions plugin

plugins.name: Skript
plugins.desc: Modify servers through a scripting interface.

plugins.name: InstantRespawn
plugins.desc:
Stops the Respawn screen from showing
and respawns straight away.

plugins.name: No Cheat Plus
plugins.desc:
Anti-cheat system to block bad modifications. 
&aProtocolLib is &a&nrecommended&r&a while using No Cheat Plus.

plugins.name: RandomTP
plugins.desc: Allows players to easily teleport to random locations in the world.

plugins.name: World Edit
plugins.desc: Build tools.

plugins.name: World Guard
plugins.desc: Create and manage regions using this plugin.

plugins.name: Red Protect
plugins.desc:
Anti-Grief, Chat protection, Spawn Protection
May be a good alternative to WorldGuard.

plugins.name: GriefPrevention
plugins.desc:
Anti-grief plugin which lets your players protect
their own builds. Can also be used to
make admin claims.

plugins.name: VoxelSniper
plugins.desc: Long range map editing tool for terraforming.

plugins.name: Fast Async VoxelSniper
plugins.desc: Optimizes VoxelSniper.

plugins.name: goBrush
plugins.desc: A plugin with brushes and height maps for terraforming.

plugins.name: Vault
plugins.desc: Economy, Permissions, and Chat API.

plugins.name: Placeholder API
plugins.desc: API which gives plugins access to variables to display.

plugins.name: ProtocolLib
plugins.desc: API which allows plugins to access new functions.

plugins.name: BetterCombat
plugins.desc:
Moves the combat style back to 1.7/1.8
Removes attack speed, adds block hitting, etc.

plugins.name: GitSchematic
plugins.desc:
Import and share WorldEdit schematics
&cRequires &nWorldEdit&c to install.

plugins.name: MCAuthenticator
plugins.desc: Enables you to secure your server using 2FA.

plugins.name: CreeperHeal
plugins.desc: Automatically heal explosion damage!

plugins.name: Combat Log
plugins.desc: Punish players who log out during combat!

plugins.name: ChestShop
plugins.desc: Chestshops that allow players to sell/buy items.

plugins.name: Crack Shot
plugins.desc: Guns in Minecraft.

plugins.name: Crates Plus
plugins.desc: Crates to give out rewards to players with keys.

plugins.name: Shopkeepers
plugins.desc: Create customizable villager shops with this plugin.

plugins.name: Silk Spawners
plugins.desc: Create and pick up custom mob spawners.

plugins.name: Orebfuscator
plugins.desc:
Counter X-Ray, resource packs, chest radars
and other similar exploits.
&cRequires &nProtocolLib

plugins.name: Chat Control
plugins.desc: Control aspects of the chat and prevent swearing/spamming.

plugins.name: Lockette
plugins.desc: Personal chest protection system.

plugins.name: EZRanksPro
plugins.desc:
Simple auto rankup plugin.
&cRequires Vault and a permissions plugin.
&cScoreboards will reset when installed.

plugins.name: MineResetLite
plugins.desc: Create mines that will reset.

plugins.name: Libs Disguises
plugins.desc:
Disguise as mobs!
&cRequires &nProtocolLib&r

plugins.name: Create Your Own Menus
plugins.desc:
Allows you to create your own GUI menus!
&cNote: May be somewhat vulnerable to exploits within certain hack clients.

plugins.name: Project Korra
plugins.desc: Bring the elemental powers of Avatar: the Last Airbender into your server.

plugins.name: EchoPet
plugins.desc: EchoPet is no longer supported for 1.9+. It will not work!

plugins.name: SimplePets
plugins.desc:
A simple pets plugin (EchoPets replacement)
&cRequires &nSimpleAPI&c.
&c&nThis may conflict with Citizens!

plugins.name: SimpleAPI
plugins.desc: A simple, lightweight set of APIs

plugins.name: Auctions
plugins.desc:
An elegant auctioning solution that
allows text tooltips for auctioned items
&cRequires &nVault&c.

plugins.name: ObsidianAuctions
plugins.desc:
Unique chat based auction system.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

plugins.name: Trade+
plugins.desc: Lets players easily and safely trade items via a GUI.

plugins.name: Action Announcer
plugins.desc: Create timed broadcasts for your server through the action bar.

plugins.name: Actionbar
plugins.desc: Animated actionbar, join messages, etc.

plugins.name: UltraBar
plugins.desc: Send Boss Bar messages, Titles, and Actionbars!

plugins.name: Holographic Displays
plugins.desc: Make floating messages around your world.

plugins.name: SuperTrails
plugins.desc: Colorful cosmetic trails to get around fabulously.

plugins.name: CustomEnchants
plugins.desc: Custom enchantments and levels!

plugins.name: Citizens
plugins.desc:
Create custom and interactive NPCs.
&cCan cause extreme lag. Lots of free RAM is required!

plugins.name: CommandNPC
plugins.desc:
Add right-clickable commands to your NPCs.
&cRequires &nCitizens&c.

plugins.name: McMMO
plugins.desc: RPG experience in Minecraft!

plugins.name: Factions
plugins.desc: Claim land, build a base and wage war!

plugins.name: Obsidian Breaker
plugins.desc:
Allows explosions to break Obsidian!
&aWorks well with Factions raiding.

plugins.name: ASkyBlock
plugins.desc:
Survive on Skyblock islands.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

plugins.name: ASkyGrid
plugins.desc:
Survive in a grid of blocks.
&cRequires &nVault&c.

plugins.name: Towny
plugins.desc: Towny is a versatile, player-controlled land management plugin.

plugins.name: TownyChat
plugins.desc: This is required if you want to let Towny modify chat.

plugins.name: VoidWorld
plugins.desc: Create void-worlds with this and Multiverse-Core.

plugins.name: PlotSquared
plugins.desc: PlotSquared is a land management plugin.

plugins.name: Core Protect
plugins.desc: Fast, efficient block logging and anti-griefing tool.

plugins.name: Log by Bayside308
plugins.desc: Log block changes in your world.

plugins.name: Joe's Horse Collect
plugins.desc: Collect, transport, place and spawn horses.

plugins.name: Joe Marriage
plugins.desc: Added marriages and divorces to your server.

plugins.name: Loot Protect
plugins.desc: Protects loot dropped upon death.

plugins.name: ClearLag
plugins.desc: Helps clear the lag on your server.

plugins.name: Scaffold
plugins.desc:
A multi-world plugin developed by Minehut.
Allows importing worlds through commands!
This plugin is recommended over Multiverse-Core

plugins.name: Multiverse
plugins.desc: Multi-world management.

plugins.name: Multiverse Portals
plugins.desc: Multiverse addon for world portal creation

plugins.name: Multiverse Nether Portals
plugins.desc: Multiverse addon for teleportation between worlds using nether portals

plugins.name: Multiverse Sign Portals
plugins.desc: Multiverse addon for teleportation between worlds using signs

plugins.name: Multiverse Adventure
plugins.desc:
Multiverse addon for adventure map makers!
Resets worlds automatically between plays.

plugins.name: Punishment
plugins.desc:
Punish your players more effectively! 
&cNote: May prevent scoreboards from properly displaying.

plugins.name: AutoMessage
plugins.desc: A fully in-game edited automatic broadcast system.

plugins.name: Tablist
plugins.desc: Animated tablist with variables

plugins.name: Titlebar
plugins.desc: Animated titlebar

plugins.name: Title Welcome Message
plugins.desc: Add welcome messages via titles, tablist headers/footers, etc.

plugins.name: Nametag Edit
plugins.desc: Edit tablist/scoreboard prefixes and suffixes

plugins.name: Area Shop
plugins.desc: Allows for the buying and renting of worldguard regions

plugins.name: CmdSigns
plugins.desc: Fully customizable command signs

plugins.name: AutoColor
plugins.desc: Permission based auto chat color

plugins.name: ChatColor+
plugins.desc:
Allows your users with permissions
to change their name/chat color!

plugins.name: TrainCarts
plugins.desc:
Link minecarts, create stations and make railway systems!
&cWARNING: May use high amounts of RAM!
&cRequires &nBKCommonLib&c.

plugins.name: BKCommonLib
plugins.desc: Dependency for TrainCarts

plugins.name: ImageOnMap
plugins.desc: Create map boards with images.

plugins.name: PhatLoots
plugins.desc: Allows players to receive loot (money/items/exp/etc...) from Chests/Mobs.

plugins.name: NBTEditor
plugins.desc:
Allows easy customization of many aspects of Minecraft
through the modification of NBT tags.

plugins.name: RPGItems
plugins.desc: Add special lore, abilities, and more to items.

plugins.name: PlayerVaults
plugins.desc:
Allows players to use an unlimited (or set)
amount of personal storage vaults.

plugins.name: Slimefun
plugins.desc:
Adds 400+ custom items to the game and
enchances the game to modpack level.

plugins.name: ExoticGarden
plugins.desc:
Exotic Garden is a Slimefun Addon which 
generates new plants all over your world.
&cRequires &c&nSlimefun &r&cto install

plugins.name: Armorstand Editor
plugins.desc: Allows players in survival to easily edit armor stand pose and attributes.
